pli-tv-pvr1.2:45.3: That is, one has obtained it. This interpretation is required by the fact that it is an offense entailing relinquishment.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:116.1: For an explanation of the idea of vikappanā, see Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:127.1: “Such things” and “that view” refer to the idea that sexual intercourse is not an obstacle to spiritual progress, see Bu Pc 68:1.49.1.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:128.1: For the meaning of “in this way”, see Bu Pc 70:1.46.1.
